attributes.action: increase democratic accountability in London by reducing the powers of the Mayor, and increasing the powers of the London Assembly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There currently exists a democratically elected London Assembly, but it has no real power over London, all of this being concentrated in the hands of an unelected Greater London Authority and a single person: the Mayor. 
More power should be given to the London Assembly in order to bring the GLA and Mayor to account, with greater powers over policies and legislation, and also a greater majority needed to pass the Mayor's budget. 
Thus, all of the Mayor's proposals would be debated properly and sensible policies and legislation would be produced, irregardless of who the Mayor is.
